channel.title: Change item stats?
channel.description:
How can I change the stats of an Item, I had just learned how to make custom items.. :D Now I was wondering how I could change the stats of that item?
I looked and couldn't find a thread, so If there is already one, can someone link it to me, or just post it in this thread?

item.title: Change item stats?
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

In items.cfg, you will se a bunch of items. So first, get the ID for the item. Second, search that ID in the items.cfg. After the name, and description, is the prices, and bonuses.

Now, back in the day, the prices were strange, because wL used a strange double to multiply the value in the file for the prices.

Anyways, the first three are General/Low alch, High alch, and specialty shop(Like shop that only sells swords). The 12 after that are the bonuses. They go like this:

ATTACK_STAB, ATTACK_SLASH, ATTACK_CRUSH, ATTACK_MAGIC, ATTACK_RANGE, DEFENCE_STAB, DEFENCE_SLASH, DEFENCE_CRUSH, DEFENCE_MAGIC, DEFENCE_RANGE, STRENGTH, PRAYER

Hopefully that works for you

Read full topic

item.title: Change item stats?
item.dc:creator: @Defile_Pker Defile_Pker
item.description:
@Defile_Pker wrote:

Just go into config. open up the item. should have a file that say’s item’s.
CTR + F search for the item. It should come up. the first three numbers should be price and such. anything after is stats.

MAKE SURE TO USE “tab” CUASE IF YOUR NEW TO IT YOU WILL GLITCH THE WHOLE SERVER!

Read full topic
